section.55: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Umar reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said:It was shown in a vision that I was rinsing my mouth with miswak and two persons began to contend with one another for getting that miswak. One was older than the other. I gave the miswak to the younger one amongst them, but it was said to me: (Let it be given) to the older one. So I gave it to the older one
